column6: 2015. beloved husband of the late betty a. (nee di. gesare) mitri; devoted father of francine hausrath
column8: deborah (late robert) hooker and nicholas mitri; cherished grandfather of 10 grandchildren and six great-grandchildren; loving son of the late frank and mary mitri; dear brother of the late john mitri; also survived by relatives and many friends. relatives and friends may visit the lombardo funeral home
column10: 885 niagara falls blvd. near eggert/sheridan dr. on monday from 2-8 pm where prayers will be said on tuesday morning at 9 o'clock and a mass of christian burial will be celebrated at st. gregory the great church at 10:30 o'clock. interment mt. olivet cemetery. mr. mitri served in the us army during ww ii.
